name: builder-mcp-server
description: MCP server for Builder Agent: file read/write, list, metadata

read_file.description: Read a file from the workspace; returns empty string if not found.

write_file.description: Write content to a file in the workspace (atomic write).

list_files.description: Recursively list files in workspace (relative paths).

create_metadata_file.description: Create metadata index (overwrites only if instructed).

update_metadata_for_file.description: Update metadata entry for a single file.

refresh_metadata_for_all_files.description: Regenerate metadata for all known files (slow).
